code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LineField=_ref=>{let{lineIndex,line,handleChangeLine}=_ref;const[color,setColor]=useState('#000000');const handleCoordinateChange=(point,axis,value)=>{handleChangeLine(lineIndex,point,axis,value);};const handleColorChange=e=>{setColor(e.target.value);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"LineField",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Line ",lineIndex]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["x0:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:line.p0.x,onChange:e=>handleCoordinateChange(0,'x',Number(e.target.value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["y0:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:line.p0.y,onChange:e=>handleCoordinateChange(0,'y',Number(e.target.value))})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["x1:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:line.p1.x,onChange:e=>handleCoordinateChange(1,'x',Number(e.target.value))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["y1:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:line.p1.y,onChange:e=>handleCoordinateChange(1,'y',Number(e.target.value))})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:["Color:",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"color",value:color,onChange:handleColorChange})]})})]});};export default LineField;
